text: My Friends Tigger & Pooh is an American computer-animated children's television series on Playhouse Disney. It had 63 episodes and 3 seasons. It ran from May 12, 2007 to October 9, 2010. == Other websites == * Category:2007 American television series debuts Category:2010 American television series endings Category:2000s American animated television series Category:Television series by Disney Category:2007 British television series debuts Category:2011 British television series endings Category:2000s British television series Category:2010s British television series
title: My Friends Tigger & Pooh
